Articles.Content:
HI. Sorry but I have a new problem that has surfaced. My action groups do not work. I am not using any action group mods. I can set then properly, but whenever I try and use them after launch they do not work. I've tried creating a new ship to test, as well as a new game, but to no avail.

For what it's worth here are the mods I run. I am not running through steam, and I open it using the '-force-opengl" parameter in x32 mode

Thanks for any help you can provide!

There are a couple possibilities I see.

First: Go into the settings screen and make sure the keys are still bound correctly.

Second: Test the action groups you can see. The Gear/Lights/Brakes icons at the top of your screen will turn on/off when you press their key.

Third: I see you have RemoteTech installed. You do have control authority correct?

Fourth: I see my Diazo folder, my Action Groups Extended mod is not hiding in there is it?

Hope that helps,

D.

Fourth: I see my Diazo folder, my Action Groups Extended mod is not hiding in there is it?

Nope. But I went ahead and installed it and it fixed the problem - so thank you!
